name: Demons Tower
description:
Demon's Tower

You embody a hero !!! Defeat the donjon and the biggest Demon to save the village.

But be careful a lot of monsters are on your way, you can die and retry but your equipement will be gone. 

Fight with the good type of weapon to kill particular ennemies and the victory will be for you!!!

Finish all rooms to challenge the boss of the stage.

Have a great journey hero !!!

NOTE: It's a work in progress build, bugs and glitchs can be occurred. Gameplay balance and his optimization will be released in next days ! See you soon .

Devs : Dimitri KAPRIS , Clément GARCIA , Tom JAUBERT
Artists : Liam CALI, Lucas MICHELAT, Benjamin HENCK
